content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x)

### Iron plate factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position x)
- Inserter (position x) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position x

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity onto a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when inspecting inventories
- Verify that the entity you are inspecting is correctly placed and accessible.
